name: Scale Laboratory
description:
This game was made for  Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 .The game was completely developed in a single week. 

Game

This game is about two artificial intelligences. Their creators designed several rooms with tests for their creation. You now have to prove how intelligent you are. You control the orange AI and the green AI.

Mechanics

 The orange AI is able to change it`s scale in both directions. The green and the orange AI can jump and  the orange AI can attract the green one with a magnet, which can only be used for a certain time per room.

-made with Unity

-sounds made with sfxr

-music made with Bosca Ceoil

-sprites made with Asprite

-the game has only been tested on Windows

-I'm sorry if my english isn't that good i'm not a native speaker.
